dmca.title: [ABUSE] copyright violation
dmca.body:
-----Original Message-----
From: Policy Enforcement [mailto:abuse@theplanet.com] 
Sent: Tuesday, November 29, 2005 8:00 AM
To: copyright@theplanet.com
Cc: Policy Enforcement
Subject: Fwd: [ABUSE] copyright violation
Importance: High


For your review.

Martin Gaston
Policy Enforcement
The Planet Internet Services, Inc.
http://www.theplanet.com/legal/

Begin forwarded message:

> From: "Dave Sole" <Dave.Sole@Militis.com>
> Date: November 29, 2005 3:01:19 AM CST
> To: <abuse@theplanet.com>
> Subject: [ABUSE] copyright violation
>
>
>
>
>
> November 29, 2005
>
>
>
> Notice of Copyright Violation:
>
>
>
> To Whom It May Concern:
>
> I am the Copyright Agent for Norealis Media Inc., owner of U.S.  
> Male Corps registered trademarks in the United States and other 
> countries, U.S. Male Corps web site (http://www.MaleCorps.com), and 
> U.S. Male Corps films and photos.
>
> All the photos below are copyrighted by U.S. Male Corps and no 
> permission has been granted to you for publication. Your use of these 
> photos is not authorized by U.S. Male Corps, and as a result, is 
> illegal.
>
>
>
> http://www.ruffandhot.com/mambo2/photopost/watermark.php?file=2235
>
> http://www.ruffandhot.com/mambo2/photopost/watermark.php?file=1340
>
> http://www.ruffandhot.com/mambo2/photopost/watermark.php?file=942
>
> http://www.ruffandhot.com/mambo2/photopost/watermark.php?file=2267
>
> http://www.ruffandhot.com/mambo2/photopost/watermark.php?file=2033
>
> http://www.ruffandhot.com/mambo2/photopost/watermark.php?file=646
>
> http://www.ruffandhot.com/mambo2/photopost/watermark.php?file=120
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
> The photos were taken from the U.S. Male Corps web site and the 
> copyright information removed, demonstrating the intent to violate 
> copyright laws. The photos are produced by, and published on, U.S.
> Male Corps web site (http://www.MaleCorps.com). All rights for any 
> material on U.S. Male Corps web site are reserved.
>
> As you have now been notified of this copyright violation, we require 
> that the above pictures be removed within 72 hours of receipt of this 
> notice.
>
>
>
> Willfully violating a copyright for the purpose of commercial  
> advantage or financial gain is a criminal offense. As per section  
> 1204 of the DMCA, penalties range up to a $500,000 fine or up to  
> five years imprisonment for a first offense, and up to a $1,000,000  
> fine or up to ten years imprisonment for subsequent offenses.
>
>
>
> Please take notice that we reserve the right to seek, without any  
> further notice, damages in the amount of $1 to $5 per photo  
> illegally used, per news group member, and per day, starting 72  
> hours after your receiving of this notice.
>
> I hereby certify, under penalty of perjury, that the information in  
> this notice is accurate to the best of my knowledge, and that I  
> have complete authority to enforce U.S. Male Corps' rights in this  
> matter.
>
>
>
> Yours truly,
>
>
>
> /dave sole/
>
> Dave sole
>
>
>
>
>
>
>
